summary: This document is an email from an Assistant United States Attorney in the Southern District of New York transmitting a draft opposition to a defense motion to dismiss the case against Jeffrey Epstein for pre-indictment delay. It indicates ongoing legal proceedings in the Epstein case.

persons.name: Assistant United States Attorney
persons.context: The sender of the email who is transmitting a draft legal opposition to a defense motion in the Epstein case.

events.title: Filing of Opposition to Motion to Dismiss
events.description: The prosecution is preparing an opposition to the defense's motion to dismiss the case against Jeffrey Epstein based on pre-indictment delay.

locations.name: United States Attorney's Office Southern District of New York
locations.address: One St. Andrew's Plaza, New York, New York

keyFacts: The defense in the Jeffrey Epstein case filed a motion to dismiss based on pre-indictment delay.
The prosecution was preparing an opposition to this motion as of February 2021.
The document shows ongoing legal activity in the Epstein case years after his death.
The communication originates from the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York.
